name: Black Moon Chronicles
description: Discover with Black Moon Chronicles the fantasy wargame of combat and strategy in a heroic world of magic and mayhem. Incarnate the great warrior Wismerhill, play through numerous campaigns fighting alongside valiant allies and against evil adversaries across the Empire of Lhynn. Complete your training and choose one of four unique armies to lead in conquest and glory. Manage your people and your castle, expand your territories, control your warriors and develop your troops as you strive to conquer your enemies. Back Moon Chronicles plunges you into massive battles. Pit your skills against formidable opponents including Demons, Orcs and The Undead. Penetrate impregnable castles, destroy remote villages and exert your rule over the realm.
